Containers.Name: malfurious-nginx
Containers.Description: This docker is designed to be used with malfurious-mailserver, malfurious-postfixadmin, malfurious-roundcube, and malfurious-redis. To setup Reverse Proxies. SSH into your server and run "docker exec -it malfurious-letsencrypt ngxproxy" and follow prompts. Name: will be the name of the service you want to reverse proxy to. Domain: will be the subdomain you want to forward to this service. Example: webmail.domain.td for webmail. Webroot: Hit enter, leave as default. Container: Enter either the services IP, or if the service is another docker on the same docker network, you can enter the dockers hostname. Port: The service/dockers listening port. HTTPS: Yes if you are providing an SSL cert, or No if not. Certificate Path: Your fullchain SSL Cert path. Certificate Key: Your privkey SSL cert path. Secure Headers: Yes Max Body size: null Done! Repeat for each service.
Containers.Overview: Malfurious-Nginx is a reverse Proxy server.
